name: Rightrack
overview:
Rightrack is a marketing research solutions provider specializing in Online business research . We offer our solutions and services to organizations as well as research professionals to help them carry out marketing research projects easier and faster at a moderate cost.

Our proprietary business research tool Easy research pro * is India’s first online mixed mode marketing research tool that handles both qualitative and quantitative research .

Easy research pro is offered to the clients as Software as a Service with customization option (SaaS) .

Specialties :

Online marketing research solutions & services ,Customized and DIY Research tools, Online Focus Groups (Text & Video), Indepth Interviews,Surveys ,Polls, Web-2.0 MR applications development , Application customization, MR services and consultancy
